name: neometry
description:
There is no history, there is no art, only reflections in a neonized cyberpunk world. Passing the first level is complicated. The second is called impossible because of something.

The third? It will be opened when 100 people surpass the second. Your skills will be tested. The third does not exist, and when it exists, you wish it never existed. Someone will get over it, and it will not be you.

This game is made following the tutorial: 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2AK-_vf44ol5C_BsapMinozqWBiocmQ7
